p: One of the most important pharmacological activities of plant essential oils is related to anti-inflammatory properties. Nutmeg essential oil is also known for inflammation reducing activity [ 24]. Therefore, next in the study, we have assessed nutmeg seed essential oil and hydrolat preparations in a virus mimetic Poly I:C-induced inflammation in vitro model by using human fibroblast cell culture. Before starting the treatments, the general toxicity test of the oils and hydrolats was performed and LD 50 doses as well as safe concentrations were established.
